downloadDescription: User Profile Management, Application Control and Masking
detailsSection:
FSLogix enhances and enables user profiles in Windows remote computing environments. FSLogix may also be used to create more portable computing sessions when using physical devices.

FSLogix includes:

  • Profile Container
  • Office Container
  • Application Masking
  • Java Version Control
installInstructionSection:
FSLogix
  1. From the FSLogix download file, select 32 bit or 64 bit depending on your environment
  2. Run FSLogixAppSetup.exe
  3. Click Options to specify an installation folder


Application Masking Rule Editor
  1. From the FSLogix download file, select 32 bit or 64 bit depending on your environment
  2. Run FSLogixAppsRuleEditorSetup.exe
  3. Click Options to specify an installation folder
  4. Accept the license agreement and click install


Java Version Control Rule Editor
  1. From the FSLogix download file, select 32 bit or 64 bit depending on your environment
  2. Run FSLogixAppsJavaRuleEditorSetup.exe
  3. Click Options to specify an installation folder
  4. Accept the license agreement and click install
